Name: Invictus Gym
Location: Hamburg-Bergedorf

# What´s special about this gym?

- It´s a high-end gym with lots of bodybuilding pros training and coaching there

- There you can find the best training equipment for bodybuilding-, powerlifting- or fitness-related goals

- Usually the gym is quite empty and you have all the weights for yourself :-)

- Sometimes you can pet the dogs Urmel and Emma that belong to the gym owner/staff members.
